attributes.title: I AM BEYOND DISSATISFIED

attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app it asked if i wanted notifications, i said no because iâ€™m usually pretty busy and donâ€™t want interruptions. ALL night i was getting dings and alerts from this app. even on do not disturb mode. Mr.trump mustâ€™ve made it so his notifications ALWAYS go through. and thatâ€™s not even the beginning. i shared the app multiple times with many people, they proved that they downloaded it so i should have hundreds of points right? nope, thereâ€™s none. itâ€™s all a big hoax to get his app out there. do not download!!!

attributes.title: S o p h i a

attributes.review: I saw this app in an add on a youtube video and thought it would help me see a different opinion of trump. It is set up badly, slanders other political parties and candidates, as well as promoting racism. Was not impressed. Nothing good about it. Definitely will be calling hq about this!
